sentences.sContent: She helped him fight his drug addiction.
sentences.sCn: 她帮助了他对抗自己的毒瘾。

sentences.sContent: ...There's still no consensus on how much time online constitutes too much or whether addiction is possible...
...Heidrich now visits websites that discuss gaming addiction regularly to remind myself to keep my love for online games in check...
...The American Psychiatric Association may consider listing Internet addiction in the next edition of its diagnostic manual...
...she posted a message on a Yahoo Internet addiction group with the subject line: I have an Internet Addiction...

words.tran: 沉溺于某种（尤其是不良的）嗜好的；入了迷的，上了瘾的

trans.tranOther: the need to take a harmful drug regularly, without being able to stop
